July 8, 1939 D Langwith Contest
Langwith Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
langwith-contest
None
Recollections of Weber
Langwith, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. March contest - 1st(£2) Ripley, 2nd(£1) Ransome and Marles. Promoted by Langwith Labour Party. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 29, 2014, 5:10 p.m. Jan. 25, 2019, 11:27 a.m.
1 Ransome Band David Aspinall
2 Ripley United Silver Prize Band W. J. Saint
3 Swanwick Colliery Reg Little
Unknown Result Blidworth Welfare Band J. T. Parkes
Unknown Result Dove Holes Band G. W. Hill
Unknown Result Eckington United Harold Barker
Unknown Result Firbeck Colliery Alexander Hilton
